title: [BUG] using redis 6.0.4，lua CVE vulnerabilities not fixed. Is there any plan to upgrade or fix it?
body:
using redis 6.0.4，lua CVE vulnerabilities not fixed：
CVE-2020-15888
CVE-2020-15889
CVE-2020-15945
CVE-2014-5461

Is there any plan to upgrade or fix it?

comments_data.body: The Lua fix for CVE-2014-5461 is resolved by #7733. As for the other reported Lua vulnerabilities, they seem to have been introduced (and solved) by newer versions of Lua only (Redis uses Lua 5.1).

Thanks Yossi. closing the issue.
@plainee please feel free to respond or re-open if you have other info.
